thread.title: Submit your question for Nick Saban for this week's episode of 'Hey Coach!'
thread.title_full: Submit your question for Nick Saban for this week's episode of 'Hey Coach!' | AL.com

author: Matt Scalici | mscalici@al.com
title: Submit your question for Nick Saban for this week's episode of 'Hey Coach!'
text:
TUSCALOOSA, Alabama -- Submit your question now for this week's edition of Alabama football coach Nick Saban 's weekly call-in radio show, recorded live from Bob's Victory Grille in Tuscaloosa on Thursday night.
Saban will discuss the Crimson Tide's big win over Arkansas and their upcoming SEC showdown against Texas A&M.
To submit a question for Saban, leave it in the comments section below, and be sure to include your first name and location.
We'll choose a handful of questions to send to the show's producers.
You can listen to the show live on these radio affiliates , or come back here Friday morning for the audio archive .
Check out more Alabama football coverage on AL.com
